content: As you enter Chapter 6, you'll be reaching the conclusion of the game. While the last Chapter does have a secret boss, you should proceed with caution as the last secret boss relates to the ending of the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 6', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Ending Spoilers!'.
The content is as follows:
As you enter Chapter 6, you'll be reaching the conclusion of the game. While the last Chapter does have a secret boss, you should proceed with caution as the last secret boss relates to the ending of the game.
